KeyLargeAggregator.mainSelect: select legacy,CPOD from PEMG_FACTS_QUANT union select legacy, cpod from pfacts_f_amou union select legacy,cpod from pfacts_f_factor union select legacy ,cpod from pfacts_f_qprice union select legacy,cpod from pfacts_f_rate_type union select legacy ,cpod from pfacts_f_udef
